content.rendered:
beauty bar in halifax | THE TEN SPOT®

welcome to 10spot® beauty bar in halifax, nova scotia. our team is full of skilled experts who know how to make you look and feel your best! we offer a variety of services like waxing, facials, nail care, and laser hair removal. when you visit us, our awesome team will set you on track to taking the steps to feeling #LikeATen®

book now!
gift certificates
buy a series
buy a membership
newsletter sign-up

Get Directions

Add Waypoint
show options hide options

Fetching directions......

Print directions
beauty bar in halifax | THE TEN SPOT®
  • 5165 south street
  • 902-445-1010
  • halifax@thetenspot.com
  • licensed to serve alcohol

Hours

mon.: 11:00 am – 8:00 pm

tue. - fri: 10:00 am – 8:00 pm

sat.: 9:00 am – 5:00 pm

sun.: closed

our beauty bar services

nails

we offer the best mani pedi in town! we offer nail extensions, gel nails, pedicures, and many more.

See services menu

waxing

we offer top notch waxing services designed to make you #feellikeaten like our brazilly®, thongkini®, general full body waxing, and much more.

See services menu

facials

our team has serious skills when it comes to facial treatments. we offer stress-free facial procedures like anti-aging facials, dermaplaning, chemical peels, and many more.

See services menu

brows

what better way to spoil yourself than by getting your brows and lashes done. wether you’re looking for lash lifts, brow lams, or more, we do it all.

See services menu

laser

hair removal can be tricky, thats why we make it simple with our awesome lineup of laser hair removal treatments like our bikini laser, full body laser, and much more.

See services menu
book now at this location

Check out our awesome reviews!

I’ve visited twice for shellac pedicures and I always have such a great experience with Kelsie. She always makes an effort to chat with me, and I think she matches my energy, which I love. I’m self conscious about my feet and hairy legs at times,... but she helps me feel at ease by meeting my questions with kindness and reminding me that my feet! Look! Normal!I’ve had pedicures in the past at other places that did a poor job trimming my nails, and this often results in painful regrowth on my big toe due to the slant of the nail. I didn’t experience that with Kelsie, which I really appreciate. It’s obvious that she knows what she’s doing.I’m really enjoying the vibe and cleanliness at The Ten Spot and I can’t really see myself going elsewhere. It’s a really beautiful and bright location, and the pedicure stations have a lovely view of the park. 10/10read more
Cait W
1718831568
Unmatched experience!!! Vanessa was so gentle and caring with my pedicure! She delivered exactly what I didn’t know I needed 😀 ! Super happy with how everything turned out!! I’ll definitely be coming back soon!
Amanda Belcastro
1718396865
First time at Ten Spot and had Emma for a wax. Very professional and kind. Excellent job, nice atmosphere and very reasonably priced. Definitely my new spot.
Silken van der Voort
1716852480
Kierstan was very knowledgeable and helpful today with advice for weak nails…very good gel treatment. Nails look great. Thank you!
Ellen Kearney
1716832010
Have been to going to The Ten Spot for about a year now, the staff are always pleasant and professional. Have been to Kaylee many times for mani’s, pedi’s and brow lam/tint! She takes such pride in her work and never disappoints. 10/10 would... recommend!read more
Jalina Jessome
1708808136
Well, Kaylee 'nailed' it again with my gel manicure. Nails are beautiful and I know the manicure will look good for a long time. I'm new to Kaylee and The Ten Spot and I'm so glad I found them. The salon is bright and open, with windows at street... level along South Street. It's just a pleasure to be in that space, especially when the services as so stellar.read more
Linda Law
1704284425
The best experience i ever had for face wax .It was so smooth and was really done with patience . The perfect brows experience till now . The girl's name who did my service was Khadijah and was really very nice and also the front desk girl was super... polite . Will definitely visit again.read more
Aditi kapoor
1699024738
Very impressed with the wax I had done tonight before a trip, it was quick and less painful than some others I’ve had! The TV in the room for Netflix was a nice touch, but Khadijah was lovely and kept up a chat to keep my mind off of it. She was... also great at recommending aftercare products.read more
Sydney Kitt
1698709882
